title: 4 Easy Ways to Find Blocked Numbers and Contacts on iPhone

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon.

steps.title: Tap Phone.
steps.content: Tap Phone . The Phone icon looks like a white phone with a green background.

steps.title: Tap Blocked Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked Contacts . You may need to scroll down to find this. It will be near the bottom of the page. [1] X Research source

steps.title: View your blocked contacts.
steps.content: View your blocked contacts. You'll see a list of all blocked contacts . If you want to unblock a contact, tap Edit in the top-right corner and tap the red circle next to the number.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon.

steps.title: Tap FaceTime.
steps.content: Tap FaceTime . The FaceTime icon looks like a white video camera with a green background.

steps.title: Tap Blocked Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked Contacts . You may need to scroll down to find this. It will be at the bottom of the page.

steps.title: View your blocked contacts.
steps.content: View your blocked contacts. You'll see a list of all blocked contacts. If you want to unblock a contact, tap Edit in the top-right corner and tap the red circle next to the number.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon.

steps.title: Tap Messages.
steps.content: Tap Messages . The Messages icon looks like a white speech bubble with a green background.

steps.title: Tap Blocked Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked Contacts . You may need to scroll down to find this. It will be underneath the SMS/MMS header.

steps.title: View your blocked contacts.
steps.content: View your blocked contacts. You'll see a list of all blocked contacts. If you want to unblock a contact, tap Edit in the top-right corner and tap the red circle next to the number.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon.

steps.title: Tap Mail.
steps.content: Tap Mail . The Mail icon looks like a white envelope with a blue background.

steps.title: Tap Blocked.
steps.content: Tap Blocked . You can find this underneath the Threading header.

steps.title: View your blocked contacts.
steps.content: View your blocked contacts. You'll see a list of all blocked contacts. If you want to unblock a contact, tap Edit in the top-right corner and tap the red circle next to the number.
